about_the_game:
Special Notice

This is idle game based on Steam inventory, with representative works such as "Banana" and "Cats".
If you have never heard of or played this type of game before, this game may not be suitable for you.


Single-handedly Challenge Ultimate World It is a idle cultivation game set in a mythical ultimate world by Chinese mythology, historical biographies, folk tales, and artistic creations.

As Just woke up "Innate creatures" you will embark on the path to transcendence divinity in this world, facing various challenges and adversaries such as gods, Buddhas, and other supernatural beings.

backstory

There are nine saints seat in the ultimate world, and there is still one missing.
It is rumored that after collecting the five innate treasure lotus, there is a trace of the possibility of restoring the chaotic green lotus.
After refining the Chaos Blue Lotus, you don't need Hongmeng Purple Qi to be transcendent and holy.

innate creatures

The innate creatures is given by heaven and the endless avenue of longevity is expected.
As long as the method of protecting the way, transcendent sanctification is not delusional.

Trading

Inventory based freelance market trading.

Now Open:

1. The first part of the Western Mountains Sutra map
2. Qi Refinement period Feng Shui gameplay
More content will be added in the future.

Time Item Drop Rules

You can obtain one time item "one year" per minute while the game is online.




* The game is developed and produced by individuals, and the ability is limited, so please bear with me if you have any questions.

name: Single-handedly Challenge Ultimate World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i9+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 1060+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: It is a idle cultivation game set in a mythical ultimate world by Chinese mythology, historical biographies, folk tales, and artistic creations.
